commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
# AIMagic 项目环境变量配置示例
# 复制此文件为 .env 并根据实际情况修改配置

# ==================== 端口配置 ====================
# 重要：这些端口配置必须与 port-config.json 保持一致
# 客户端端口
CLIENT_PORT=3001
VITE_CLIENT_PORT=3001

# 后台管理系统端口
ADMIN_PORT=3003
VITE_ADMIN_PORT=3003

# 后端API服务端口
SERVER_PORT=3007
VITE_SERVER_PORT=3007
PORT=3007

# ==================== 数据库配置 ====================
DB_HOST=localhost
DB_PORT=3306
DB_NAME=aimagic
DB_USER=root
DB_PASSWORD=

# ==================== JWT配置 ====================
JWT_SECRET=your-secret-key-here
JWT_EXPIRES_IN=24h

# ==================== ComfyUI配置 ====================
COMFYUI_HOST=localhost
COMFYUI_PORT=8188

# ==================== 开发环境配置 ====================
NODE_ENV=development

# ==================== 文件上传配置 ====================
MAX_FILE_SIZE=10485760
UPLOAD_PATH=uploads/

# ==================== 日志配置 ====================
LOG_LEVEL=info

# ==================== CORS配置 ====================
# 允许的前端域名，多个用逗号分隔
CORS_ORIGIN=http://localhost:3001,http://localhost:3003
